website_summaries.verdict: Older Star Wars fans will appreciate the attention to detail and the size of this figurine. Younger fans will enjoy the electronics and interactivity.
pros: Sturdy construction, stands up to rough play
Character speaks, lights up, and reacts to combat
Authentic Darth Vader appearance, works as a collectible figurine, too
cons: Lightsaber is not easy to remove, can be a safety hazard
Lightsaber also breaks easily, limiting play appeal

customer_reviews.title: Attention action figure fans
customer_reviews.text: My son (4) has quite a superhero action figure collection and this one is part of it. He loves it so much and can't stop playing with it. We even have them in his bath. Virtually impossible to damage or break. Highly recommended. A bit expensive compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Metuka

customer_reviews.title: Made a little boy very excited
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to make my grandson happy on his birthday and this did the trick. I got the bigger one as he is only three and I wanted something safe for him to play with. This is his favorite Star Wars character.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA J.

customer_reviews.title: Box arrived dirty and bent
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived dirty and bent, but the toy looks fine. I just prefer to have cleaning packaging when I'm giving something as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jbweaver

customer_reviews.title: Typical toy from Hasbro (Is great the first day but starts to show some wear ...
customer_reviews.text: The light saber doesn't stay in, and it is somewhere only Darth knows. Typically toy from Hasbro (Is great the first day but starts to show some wear very quickly).
customer_reviews.author: A-Salis

customer_reviews.title: Great 12" figure
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old nephew loves it. Stands up to rough play. The light saber is removable, so that's a plus too. Great price for a 12" figure!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than lego mini-figs, and harder to loose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for twin four-year-olds. These are a lot harder to loose than their lego mini-figs they insist on taking everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Andy T. Knote

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and detailed 12" action figure. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy! Excited to give this to my 4 year old for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Luke ... I am your Father
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my nephew. Lower priced than at a couple of the chain department stores. Seems like a solid toy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a particularly requested Christmas gift for a young nephew.
customer_reviews.author: nanb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Good and Awesome decorative for kids room
customer_reviews.text: My son collects action figures and cars and he was happy to have Darth Vader join his army of superheroes who are protecting his youtube channel from Aliens. He made a funny video about it. Of course you can see it. In YouTube, search for "Save YouTube from Alien invasion with 1DoctorGenius and his army of Superheroes!!" :) It is sturdy, good and completes his collection.
customer_reviews.author: 1DoctorGenius

product_meta.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith Darth Vader
product_meta.description: Heroes, villains, droids, starships, space vehicles, and creatures! Discover the exciting stories of good versus evil in a galaxy far, far away with this 12 inch Darth Vader figure from Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith! Amidst the rise of the evil Galactic Empire, the once-heroic Jedi knight Anakin Skywalker fell to the dark side and arose as Darth Vader, the Dark Lord of the Sith. As the Republic collapsed and the Jedi were all but decimated, Darth Vader embraced his new destiny as the apprentice to Darth Sidious – otherwise known as Emperor Palpatine, the evil phantom menace bent on ruling the galaxy. Standing at an imposing 12 inches and outfitted with his signature lightsaber accessory, this Darth Vader figure from Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith puts you right in the middle of the action! Collect and do battle with this and other figures from the Star Wars universe, each sold separately. May the Force be with you! Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Detailed 12-inch figure looks like Darth Vader from Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith
Includes Darth Vader’s signature lightsaber accessory
Re-create favorite moments from Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars38 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
